backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining BlogPost type with create, get, list, and search functions using an in-memory Map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing SEO, indexing, and branding changes with associated files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions including light and dark mode OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file setting global SEO title, description, robots meta tag, and mounting the React app.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt allowing full indexing and referencing the sitemap.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Static sitemap listing main pages, task pages, and sample blog post URLs.
frontend/scripts/README-sitemap.md: Instructions for updating sitemap.xml when blog posts change.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for home, blog, post detail, about, and task pages within SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/blog/BlogPostCar: Displays a blog post preview card with title, date, excerpt, and link to full post.
frontend/src/components/home/DailyTaskSe: Daily task UI that opens random external links and accepts a user-submitted secret code with success feedback.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection: Hero section with background image, English headline, Bengali intro text, and a CTA linking to Facebook.
frontend/src/components/home/TimeBucksMe: Displays a promotional card for TimeBucks with earning details and a CTA button opening an external signup link.
frontend/src/components/home/TimeBucksSt: Shows a step-by-step guide for using TimeBucks along with a special reminder note.
frontend/src/components/home/TranscribeM: Presents a detailed card explaining TranscribeMe transcription work, steps, tips, and a link to apply.
frontend/src/components/home/WelcomeSect: Introduces the site owner and explains upcoming income-site content for users.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileMen: Implements a slide-out mobile navigation menu with scroll locking and various links.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Renders the site footer with about info, quick links, help links, social icons, and copyright.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Provides the site header with logo, navigation links, a tasks dropdown, and mobile menu trigger.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the overall page layout with background, header, outlet content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/monetization/AdP: Displays a styled placeholder box for ads with different size variants.
frontend/src/components/monetization/Ads: Loads an Adsterra script once and renders a container div for the native banner.
frontend/src/components/monetization/Aff: Displays a styled affiliate link placeholder with title, description, and a button.
frontend/src/components/seo/Seo.tsx: Updates document title, meta tags, Open Graph, Twitter Card, and canonical link for SEO.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskHowToC: Shows a fourâ€‘step instructional list for completing a task.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskIntera: Provides UI to start a task, enter a secret code, and show a temporary success message.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBlogPosts.ts: Fetches blog posts, single posts, and search results using the actor with fallback to sample posts.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling login, stored identity loading, and state management.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and extensive CSS variables for theming, backgrounds, and global layout.
frontend/src/lib/blogSampleFallback.ts: Provides fallback sample blog posts when the backend has no data or is unavailable.
frontend/src/lib/helpLinks.ts: Exports a list of admin help links with labels and Facebook URLs.
frontend/src/lib/siteConfig.ts: Defines global site metadata including name, description, URL, and default image.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an About page with biography, expertise sections, and contact information.
frontend/src/pages/BlogListPage.tsx: Displays a list of blog posts with loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPostPage.tsx: Shows a single blog post with metadata, ads, and fallback handling for missing posts.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with SEO metadata, hero section, and welcome section.
frontend/src/pages/Task1Page.tsx: Displays Task 1 instructions and interaction card with a link to the task URL.
frontend/src/pages/Task2Page.tsx: Displays Task 2 instructions and interaction card with a link to the task URL.
frontend/src/pages/Task3Page.tsx: Displays Task 3 instructions and interaction card with a link to the task URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, themes, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Tracks project version, homepage/visual/navigation design requirements, known issues, and existing feature definitions for the site.
